bibl.title: Zum Prosatext des homerischen Fragments P. Heid. IV 289. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete
ArchPF

bibl.note: New interpretation of P. Heid. IV, 289 (= M.-P.3 557.01; LDAB 1370). So far the fragment has been correlated to the Cypria. It should rather be examined together with a Homeric scholion by Porphyry (schol. Il. A 449a; Od. d 52). It should be inferred that either the papyrus preserves the source of Porphyry's scholion or that the two texts have the same older mythographical source in common.
